title: MD
biography: Giorgio Locatelli is an Italian Michelin starred chef and restaurateur working and living in the United Kingdom.
aiSummary: Franco Locatelli is a hematology specialist with an H-index of 125 at Bambino Gesù Hospital (Member). Has been published in The Lancet, New England Journal of Medicine, The Lancet Respiratory Medicine. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
